info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 09 at 8:44PM CDT until May 09 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN BURLEIGH AND NORTHEASTERN MORTON COUNTIES... At 843 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mandan, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Public. At 840pm CDT golf ball sized hail was reported in Mandan. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Bismarck, Mandan, Double Ditch Indian Village, University Of Mary and Fort Abraham Lincoln State Park. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
